instruction: looking for an action movie about a hitman and some crazy futuristic stuff
output: If you’re into intense action with a sci-fi twist, you gotta check out Gemini Man! 🎬 Will Smith faces off against a younger clone of himself – it’s wild and full of edge-of-your-seat moments. Perfect for a thrilling movie night! 🔥

instruction: any good movies where someone fights a clone of themselves?
output: Oh, Gemini Man is exactly what you want! Imagine a skilled assassin battling a younger, faster version of himself. It’s packed with cool action and some deep identity stuff. Definitely a must-watch! 🕵️‍♂️🤯

instruction: recommend me a sci-fi action movie with lots of adventure and suspense
output: You should totally watch Gemini Man! It’s got that perfect mix of science fiction, high-stakes action, and thrilling suspense. Plus, Will Smith is awesome as a hitman facing his own clone. Give it a shot! 🚀🔫
